author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: exit abort_edit early when the activity wasn't created.
(abort_edit): if no activity was created, don't try to delete it.

author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: improve error handling of OPTIONS requests.
(svn_ra_serf__options_context_t): add parser field. We need it to be able
to reference any XML parser errors later.
(svn_ra_serf__create_options_req): store reference to parser in opt_ctx.
svn_ra_serf__get_options_parser_error): new functions to get to errors.

author: lgo
msg: Fix build errors: declare variables at start of function.
(guess_child_merge_src_url): moved declaration of target_revision to start

author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: give the XML parser a place to return the HTTP status code (instead
(svn_ra_serf__create_options_req): pass the address of the status_code
